p: Cells were prepared as previously mentioned. Treatment of cells (10 5) with Annexin V-FITC and propidium iodide (PI) was by apoptosis detection kit [BD Biosciences, San Jose, CA]. The binding of Annexin V-FITC and PI was examined using flow cytometry FACScalibur (BD Biosciences, San Jose, CA). CellQuest software was used for performing quadrant analysis of co-ordinate dot plots.
